entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 4.

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls late this evening and overnight. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023
